sentences.en: A hardener is added to the acrylic enamel just before use.
sentences.cn: 在用之前添加硬化剂到丙烯酸瓷釉中.

sentences.en: Does the meeting that wash a tooth cause harm to enamel?
sentences.cn: 洗牙会对牙釉质造成伤害 吗 ?

sentences.en: Enamel is the hardest structure of the body and the richest in Calcium.
sentences.cn: 釉质是身体中最硬的组织最富于钙质.

sentences.en: He collected coloured enamel bowls from Yugoslavia.
sentences.cn: 他藏有来自南斯拉夫的彩色搪瓷碗.

sentences.en: I chipped the enamel on my front tooth when I fell over.
sentences.cn: 我跌倒时门牙的珐琅质碰碎了.

sentences.en: Made from cast iron, it is finished in graphite enamel.
sentences.cn: 它是用铸铁制成，最后在外面搪了一层石墨。

sentences.en: My part that protrudes from the gum has a'skin " of enamel.
sentences.cn: 在我突出于齿龈的部分有一层珐琅 “ 皮 ”.

sentences.en: Some of the enamel on this pan is chipped off.
sentences.cn: 这平底锅上的搪瓷有些已脱落.

sentences.en: The enamel gives new brass an authentically tarnished finish.
sentences.cn: 用瓷釉作末道漆使新的黄铜器看似自然地失去了光泽。

sentences.en: The enamel of her teeth is very white.
The enamel surface microhardness was measured by a Leitzs microhardness tester.
sentences.cn: 采用维氏显微硬度仪测定经饮料浸泡后牙釉质表面显微硬度的变化.

sentences.en: The iron pan was covered with white enamel.
sentences.cn: 这个铁盘子上涂了一层白色的搪瓷.

sentences.en: This pan is covered with enamel.
Uses: For manufacture of ceramics , porcelain, enamel and detergent material.
sentences.cn: 用途: 供制陶瓷 、 搪瓷、清洁剂等.

trans.tran_en: a hard shiny substance that is put onto metal, clay etc for decoration or protection
